About Myself

Alex is a creative mind who loves to learn and thrive in environments that constantly embrace new technologies. He is exploring new opportunities in learning from others as much as he can in ever growing companies.

Work

Clients

While we all felt that Alex was a great asset to our team — and really worked hard to understand our products from the point of view of the customer — we also all agree he should shower more often.

Working with Alex was the highlight of my career. Other moments of note were collecting the largest number of paperclips in the office, and winning a trophy for saying "uh huh, and then what?" 30 times in a row to my boyfriend without him noticing.

Yea, I guess hes good at computers or something, but let me ask you this: Is Math related to Science?

Back in old country only nerds who is playing on computers. Now all bros is wanting to make codes and junk. I lost foot in war. You dont see girls asking me about homework.
